items.title: AI-Powered Image Analysis (macOS 26+)
items.description: Revolutionary on-device AI analyzes your images to identify objects, scenes, text, colors, and qualityâ€”all processed locally with complete privacy. Smart tags, search, and organization powered by Vision and Core ML.

items.title: Smart Search & Organization
items.description: Find images instantly with AI-powered search by detected content, text, colors, and scenes. Automatic categorization into smart collections makes organizing thousands of images effortless.

items.title: Enhanced Accessibility with AI
items.description: AI-generated image descriptions provide rich, detailed VoiceOver experiences. Multi-language support and context-aware descriptions make images accessible to everyone.

items.title: Comprehensive Preferences System
items.description: Complete preferences interface with tabbed navigation for General settings, Appearance customization, and Keyboard shortcuts management. Features live previews and comprehensive validation.

items.title: Advanced Keyboard Shortcuts
items.description: Fully customizable keyboard shortcuts with conflict detection, import/export functionality, and comprehensive help documentation. Record new shortcuts with intuitive interface.

items.title: Enhanced Appearance Controls
items.description: Fine-tune the app's visual appearance with glassmorphism effects, animation intensity controls, hover effects, and toolbar style options.

items.title: What's New Feature
items.description: Stay informed about new features and improvements with automatic update notifications and on-demand access through the Help menu.

items.title: AI Features with Complete Privacy
items.description: All AI processing happens entirely on your Mac using Apple's Vision and Core ML. No cloud services, no data collection, no tracking. Your images never leave your device.

items.title: Lightning-Fast AI Analysis
items.description: Optimized AI pipeline analyzes images in 1-2 seconds with intelligent caching. Background processing ensures smooth browsing while AI works. Results appear progressively as analysis completes.

items.title: Improved Dark Mode Interface
items.description: Lighter, more pleasant background colors in preferences and throughout the app for better visibility and reduced eye strain.

items.title: Enhanced User Experience
items.description: Comprehensive validation system with real-time feedback, smooth animations, and intuitive interface design throughout preferences.

items.title: Enhanced Accessibility Support
items.description: Comprehensive accessibility improvements including high contrast mode compatibility and detailed accessibility hints for interactive elements.

items.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
items.description: New and refined keyboard shortcuts for navigation, zooming, fullscreen, grid view, and slideshow controls.

items.title: Faster Image Loading
items.description: Optimized image loading pipeline reduces wait times and improves responsiveness.

items.title: Better Memory Management
items.description: Enhanced memory handling prevents crashes when viewing large image collections.

items.title: Dark Mode Enhancements
items.description: Refined dark mode appearance with better contrast and visual hierarchy.

items.title: Fixed Thumbnail Generation
items.description: Resolved issues with thumbnail generation for certain image formats.

items.title: Window State Persistence
items.description: Fixed window size and position not being remembered between app launches.

items.title: Keyboard Navigation
items.description: Corrected keyboard shortcuts not working in certain UI states and improved accessibility announcements.
